import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Blog(){// مثال لبيانات المدونة (يمكن استبدالها ببيانات حقيقية من API)
const posts=[{id:1,title:'First Post',excerpt:'This is my first blog post.'},{id:2,title:'React Tips',excerpt:'How to use React Router.'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Blog Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posts",children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/post/${post.id}`,children:"Read More"})]},post.id))})]});}export default Blog;
